name: irreclaimable
content:
irreclaimable adjective
(LAND)
Add to word list
Add to word list
not able to be made suitable for building or farming: There is a great deal of barren and irreclaimable land in the moors. Related word
reclaim

irreclaimable adjective
(BEHAVIOUR)
(of a person, their bad behaviour not able to be improved: He was kept apart from the other prisoners because he was regarded as being utterly depraved and irreclaimable.
More examplesFewer examplesThe victim was beyond all question an obstreperous and irreclaimable ruffian.
